titleStmt.title: Angliæ decus & tutamen, or, The glory and safety of this nation under our present King and Queen plainly demonstrating, that it is not only the duty, but the interest of all Jacobites and disaffected persons to act for, and submit to, this government.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by Richard Baldwin ...,

notesStmt.note: This work appears at reel 340:19 (Union Theological Seminary copy), and reel 17ll:7 (University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library copy).
Reproduction of originals in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York, and University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
